directions: Place diced potatoes into a large saucepan, and cover with water.  Bring to a boil over high heat, then reduce heat, and simmer until potatoes are tender, about 25 minutes.  Stir in the green onions, dill, and buttermilk; bring back to a simmer.  Stir in the half-and-half before serving.
title: Summa Borscht
